from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
arr = []
for i in range(n):
    s = map(str, input().split())
    arr.append(''.join(s))
c = Counter(arr)
keys = list(c.keys())
ans = []
for item in keys:
    x = c[item]
    if x == item.count('T'):
        ans.append(x)
if len(ans) != 0:
    print(max(ans))
else:
    print(0)

from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
arr = []
for i in range(n):
    s = map(str, input().split())
    arr.append(''.join(s))
c = Counter(arr)
k = list(c.keys())
ans = []
for item in k:
    x = c[item]
    if x == item.count('T'):
        ans.append(x)
if len(ans) != 0:
    print(max(ans))
else:
    print(0)

from collections import Counter
n = int(input())
matrix = []
arr = []
for i in range(n):
    s = input().strip().split()
    matrix.append(s)
    arr.append(''.join(s))
unique = list(set(arr))
c = Counter(arr)
ans = []
for items in unique:
    x = c[items]
    if x == items.count('T'):
        ans.append(x)
if ans != []:
    print(max(ans))
else:
    print(0)
